item.description:
For our March meeting we will start at 5 pm with our "Swap Meeting": Swapping, selling or negotiating deals with others for merchandise they bring to get rid of. Please bring any and all items with some type of sticker on it with your name and price. 2 Special Guest speakers - Bob O'Keefe from MFD; and our own Robyn D. to discuss "Traveling with Trucks".   

Don't forget: start digging in your closets or going through your existing riding gear and/or accessories to see what items you no longer use or have too many of or just plain do not want.  Please arrive at 4:45 to lay out your items if you need extra time. Please RSVP to twocyclenut@verizon.net, or on this site, if you are attending the SWAP or regular meeting (and are eating) in case we need Bickford’s to have an extra waitress on staff.

        The actual meeting will still start at 6 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the function room in the back, as always.
item.name: General Members Meeting
